name: Clover Harvest Minigame
author: Alucard648
description: Clover Harvesting minigameFind and pluck all 4-leaf clovers without plucking 3-leaf ones. 3 misses or run out of time limit and it`s game over.
setup: 1.Set up 4 consecutive combos, 3-leaf, hidden 4-leaf, plucked 3-leaf, plucked/revealed 4-leaf2.Build cloverfield, using only first 2 combos from previous step3.Place FFC with 1st combo and script assigned D0 - #####.____ - string to display at introduction. D0 - _____.#### - string to display when the game is started. D1 - game cost, in rupees. D2 - ID of item to reward (-1 - secret trigger) D3 - Miss count limit. If it expires, game ends. 0 for default 3. D4 - unused D5 - combo position to render HUD for minigame D6 - #####.____ - string to display at ending the game via victory. D6 - _____.#### - string to display at ending the game via loss. D7 - Time limit, in frames. 0 for no time limit
